ci_support_linux_64_root_base6.34.10.yam:
c_compiler:
- gcc
c_compiler_version:
- '14'
c_stdlib:
- sysroot
c_stdlib_version:
- '2.17'
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cxx_compiler:
- gxx
cxx_compiler_version:
- '14'
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:cos7
expat:
- '2'
fftw:
- '3'
liblzma_devel:
- '5'
numpy:
- '2'
pin_run_as_build:
  python:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
python:
- 3.10.* *_cpython
- 3.11.* *_cpython
- 3.12.* *_cpython
- 3.13.* *_cp313
readline:
- '8'
root_base:
- 6.34.10
target_platform:
- linux-64
zip_keys:
- - c_compiler_version
  - cxx_compiler_version

about.summary: CDS Control Room tools

about.description:
`libawg` is an interface for opening, configuring, and controlling excitations
on the LIGO real-time data acquisition system.
about.summary: Library used to interface with awgtpman, the waveform excitation program used at LIGO

about.description: DMT is part of the LIGO real-time data acquisition system
about.summary: Library for interfacing with LIGO's data flow manager

about.description:
`libdtt` is an interface for creating and running diagnostics tests on
the LIGO real-time data acquisition system.
about.summary: Library containing the functionality of LIGO's Diagnostics Test Tools.

about.description:
`libfantom` is a LIGO data access library for
translating data frames and NDS data.
about.summary: Library for translation of LIGO data frames and LIGO NDS data.

about.description:
`libfilterfile` is an interface for reading and writing foton filter files,
used at LIGO to encode filter coefficients.
about.summary: C++ library for manipulating foton filter files.

about.description:
Other LIGO programs such as `awggui` and `diaggui` use `libfilterwiz` to create
`foton`-style filter design windows for one-off filters.
about.summary: Functions for creating foton-style filter design windows.

about.description: `libsistr` is a library used for streaming custom excitations.
about.summary: Library for sending arbitrary data as excitations using LIGO's awgtpman.

about.description:
`libtestpoint` allows opening and closing of test points on the LIGO
real-time data acquisition system.
about.summary: Library for manipulating LIGO test points.

about.description: The gui libraries provide basic widgets to control room tools apps.
about.summary: Common libraries used by LIGO control room graphical programs.

about.description: ROOT dictionaries allow dynamic access to C++ objects.
about.summary: Common ROOT dictionary libraries used by LIGO control room programs.

about.description:
Library for design, inspection and manipulation of filters and
LIGO style filter files.
about.summary: Python bindings for foton functions

about.description:
Create excitations using LIGO\'s awgtpman using Python.
The awg module allows simple python scripting of excitations
on the LIGO data acquisition system.
about.summary: Python bindings to libawg

about.description: DMT viewer is used in LIGO control rooms to display DMT data.
about.summary: Graphical program for viewing output of DMT monitors.

about.description:
`awggui` is an interface for creating excitations on LIGO's data
acquisition system, including many periodic functions, random noise
excitations, and custom user-defined excitations.
about.summary: Graphical program for running excitations using LIGO's awgtpman.

about.description: Includes awgexec_run program for streaming excitations from Matlab.
about.summary: Stream arbitrary data as an excitation using LIGO's awgtpman.

about.description:
`diag` is suitable for scripting diagnostics test and excitations on LIGO's
real-time data acquisition system.
about.summary: Command line program for running LIGO's Diagnostics Test Tools

about.description:
`diagd` is suitable for remotely running diagnostics test
and excitations on LIGO's real-time data acquisition system.
about.summary: Daemon for running LIGO's Diagnostics Test Tools remotely

about.description:
`diaggui` is a user interface for running diagnostics tests, creating
excitations, calculating results on LIGO's real time system data
acquisition system.
about.summary: Graphical program for running LIGO's Diagnostics Test Tools.

about.description: Monitors include InspiralRange.
about.summary: Monitors used in LIGO control rooms.

about.description:
Stream arbitrary data to multiple exciatation channels at once on
LIGO's real-time data acquisition system.
about.summary: Stream multiple arbitrary data sets as excitations using LIGO's awgtpman.

about.description:
Close and open test points on LIGO's real-time data acquisition system
conda update --prefix /build/jenkins/home/mambaforge/envs/buildenvs anaconda
about.summary: Command line tool for manipulating test points using LIGO's awgtpman.

about.description: Includes xmlconv, xmldata, and xmldir.  Files can be produced by diag or diaggui.
about.summary: Command line tools for XML files produced using DTT.

about.description: `fantom` can be used to translate from different LIGO data formats.
about.summary: Command-line program for translation of LIGO frame and NDS data.

about.description:
`foton` is used at LIGO to design and display filters,
then generate filter files usable by the LIGO real-time
data acquisition system.
A variety of design strategies are supported.
about.summary: Graphical program for designing and generating filters.

about.description: lidax reads LIGO frame files.
about.summary: Graphical program for retrieving LIGO data.

about.description:
cds-crtools is a metapackage that installs several programs
used to control LIGO-style interfrometers. The package includes
`diag`, `diagd`, `diaggui`, `awggui`, `tpcmd`, `chndump`
along with `foton`, the filter design program, and others.

real-time data acquisition system.
about.summary: Command line program for running LIGO's Diagnostics Test Tools

about.description:
`diagd` is suitable for remotely running diagnostics test
and excitations on LIGO's real-time data acquisition system.
about.summary: Daemon for running LIGO's Diagnostics Test Tools remotely

about.description:
`diaggui` is a user interface for running diagnostics tests, creating
excitations, calculating results on LIGO's real time system data
acquisition system.
about.summary: Graphical program for running LIGO's Diagnostics Test Tools.

about.description: Monitors include InspiralRange.
about.summary: Monitors used in LIGO control rooms.

about.description:
Stream arbitrary data to multiple exciatation channels at once on
LIGO's real-time data acquisition system.
about.summary: Stream multiple arbitrary data sets as excitations using LIGO's awgtpman.

about.description:
Close and open test points on LIGO's real-time data acquisition system
conda update --prefix /build/jenkins/home/mambaforge/envs/buildenvs anaconda
about.summary: Command line tool for manipulating test points using LIGO's awgtpman.

about.description: Includes xmlconv, xmldata, and xmldir.  Files can be produced by diag or diaggui.
about.summary: Command line tools for XML files produced using DTT.

about.description: `fantom` can be used to translate from different LIGO data formats.
about.summary: Command-line program for translation of LIGO frame and NDS data.

about.description:
`foton` is used at LIGO to design and display filters,
then generate filter files usable by the LIGO real-time
data acquisition system.
A variety of design strategies are supported.
about.summary: Graphical program for designing and generating filters.

about.description: lidax reads LIGO frame files.
about.summary: Graphical program for retrieving LIGO data.

about.description:
cds-crtools is a metapackage that installs several programs
used to control LIGO-style interfrometers. The package includes
`diag`, `diagd`, `diaggui`, `awggui`, `tpcmd`, `chndump`
along with `foton`, the filter design program, and others.
about.summary: CDS Control Room tools

raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "cds-crtools" %}
{% set version = "4.1.4" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}-split
  version: {{ version|replace('_', '.') }}

source:
  url: https://git.ligo.org/cds/software/dtt/-/archive/{{ version }}/{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: bb935ae3442d06f05aa706ad518bcce6f0b591ad8003fd5001c54bc307734c43
  patches:
    # backport https://git.ligo.org/cds/software/dtt/-/merge_requests/39
    - 0001-fix-use-of-unittest.TestCase.assertEquals.patch

build:
  error_overlinking: true
  number: 9
  skip: true  # [win]

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}
    - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
    - {{ stdlib("c") }}
    - cmake
    - make  # [not win]
    - pkg-config  # [not win]
  host:
    - cyrus-sasl
    - expat
    - fftw
    - gds-base
    - gds-base-crtools
    - gds-base-gdstrig  # [not osx]
    - gds-lsmp  # [not osx]
    - gds-root-extensions-crtools  # [not osx]
    - liblzma-devel
    - nds2-client  # [not osx]
    - readline
    - root_base

outputs:
  # -- C libraries ----------

  - name: libawg
    build:
      error_overlinking: false
      skip: true  # [osx]
    requirements:
      build:
        - {{ compiler('c') }}
        - {{ stdlib("c") }}
        - make  # [unix]
      host:
        - gds-base
        - {{ pin_subpackage('libtestpoint', exact=True) }}
      run:
        - gds-base
        - {{ pin_subpackage('libtestpoint', exact=True) }}
    files:
      - include/gds/dtt/awg*.h
      - include/gds/dtt/gdsrand.h
      - lib/libawg{{ SHLIB_EXT }}*
    test:
      commands:
        - test -f ${PREFIX}/lib/libawg${SHLIB_EXT}  # [unix]
    about:
      home: https://git.ligo.org/cds/software/dtt
      dev_url: https://git.ligo.org/cds/software/dtt.git
      license: GPL-2.0-or-later
      license_family: GPL
      license_file:
        - COPYING
        - COPYING-GPL-3
      summary: Library used to interface with awgtpman, the waveform excitation program used at LIGO
      description: |
        `libawg` is an interface for opening, configuring, and controlling excitations
        on the LIGO real-time data acquisition system.

  - name: libdfm
    build:
      error_overlinking: true
      skip: true  # [osx]
    requirements:
      build:
        - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
        - {{ stdlib("c") }}
        - make  # [unix]
      host:
        - gds-base
        - {{ pin_subpackage('libfantom', exact=True) }}
        - {{ pin_subpackage('libtestpoint', exact=True) }}
      run:
        - gds-base
        - {{ pin_subpackage('libfantom', exact=True) }}
        # - {{ pin_subpackage('libtestpoint', exact=True) }}
    files:
      - include/gds/dfm/dataacc.hh
      - include/gds/dfm/dfm.hh
      - include/gds/dfm/dfmapi.hh
      - include/gds/dfm/dfmfunc.hh
      - include/gds/dfm/dfmlars.hh
      - include/gds/dfm/dfmnds.hh
      - include/gds/dfm/dfmsends.hh
      - include/gds/dfm/dfmsm.hh
      - include/gds/dfm/dfmtype.hh
      - include/gds/dfm/udn.hh
      - lib/libdfm{{ SHLIB_EXT }}*
    test:
      commands:
        - test -f ${PREFIX}/lib/libdfm${SHLIB_EXT}  # [unix]
    about:
      home: https://git.ligo.org/cds/software/dtt
      dev_url: https://git.ligo.org/cds/software/dtt.git
      license: GPL-2.0-or-later
      license_family: GPL
      license_file:
        - COPYING
        - COPYING-GPL-3
      summary: Library for interfacing with LIGO's data flow manager
      description: |
        DMT is part of the LIGO real-time data acquisition system

  - name: libdtt
    build:
      error_overlinking: true
      skip: true  # [osx]
    requirements:
      build:
        - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
        - {{ stdlib("c") }}
        - make  # [unix]
      host:
        - expat
        - gds-base
        - gds-base-crtools
        - {{ pin_subpackage('libawg', exact=True) }}
        - {{ pin_subpackage('libdfm', exact=True) }}
        - {{ pin_subpackage('libfantom', exact=True) }}
        - {{ pin_subpackage('libtestpoint', exact=True) }}
        - nds2-client
        - readline
      run:
        - gds-base
        - gds-base-crtools
        - {{ pin_subpackage('libawg', exact=True) }}
        - {{ pin_subpackage('libdfm', exact=True) }}
        - libexpat
        - {{ pin_subpackage('libfantom', exact=True) }}
        - {{ pin_subpackage('libtestpoint', exact=True) }}
        - nds2-client
        - readline

    files:
      - lib/libdtt{{ SHLIB_EXT }}*
    test:
      commands:
        - test -f ${PREFIX}/lib/libdtt${SHLIB_EXT}  # [unix]
    about:
      home: https://git.ligo.org/cds/software/dtt
      dev_url: https://git.ligo.org/cds/software/dtt.git
      license: GPL-2.0-or-later
      license_family: GPL
      license_file:
        - COPYING
        - COPYING-GPL-3
      summary: Library containing the functionality of LIGO's Diagnostics Test Tools.
      description: |
        `libdtt` is an interface for creating and running diagnostics tests on
        the LIGO real-time data acquisition system.

  - name: libfantom
    build:
      error_overlinking: true
      skip: true  # [osx]
    requirements:
      build:
        - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
        - {{ stdlib("c") }}
        - make  # [unix]
      host:
        - gds-base
        - gds-lsmp
        - readline
      run:
        - gds-base
        - gds-lsmp
        - readline
    files:
      - include/gds/fantom/
      - lib/libfantom{{ SHLIB_EXT }}*
    test:
      commands:
        - test -f ${PREFIX}/lib/libfantom${SHLIB_EXT}  # [unix]
    about:
      home: https://git.ligo.org/cds/software/dtt
      dev_url: https://git.ligo.org/cds/software/dtt.git
      license: GPL-2.0-or-later
      license_family: GPL
      license_file:
        - COPYING
        - COPYING-GPL-3
      summary: Library for translation of LIGO data frames and LIGO NDS data.
      description: |
        `libfantom` is a LIGO data access library for
        translating data frames and NDS data.

  - name: libfilterfile
    requirements:
      build:
        - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
        - {{ stdlib("c") }}
        - make  # [unix]
      host:
        - gds-base
      run:
        - gds-base
    files:
      - include/foton/Filter*.hh
      - lib/libfilterfile.*so*
    test:
      commands:
        - test -f ${PREFIX}/lib/libfilterfile.so  # [unix]
    about:
      home: https://git.ligo.org/cds/software/dtt
      dev_url: https://git.ligo.org/cds/software/dtt.git
      license: GPL-2.0-or-later
      license_family: GPL
      license_file:
        - COPYING
        - COPYING-GPL-3
      summary: C++ library for manipulating foton filter files.
      description: |
        `libfilterfile` is an interface for reading and writing foton filter files,
        used at LIGO to encode filter coefficients.

  - name: libfilterwiz
    build:
      error_overlinking: true
      skip: true  # [osx]
    requirements:
      build:
        - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
        - {{ stdlib("c") }}
        - make  # [not win]
      host:
        - {{ pin_subpackage('crtools-gui-libraries', exact=True) }}
        - gds-base
        - {{ pin_subpackage('libfilterfile', exact=True) }}
        - root_base
      run:
        - {{ pin_subpackage('crtools-gui-libraries', exact=True) }}
        - gds-base
        - {{ pin_subpackage('libfilterfile', exact=True) }}
        - root_base
    files:
      - include/foton/TLGFilter*.hh
      - lib/libfilterwiz{{ SHLIB_EXT }}*
    test:
      commands:
        - test -f ${PREFIX}/lib/libfilterwiz${SHLIB_EXT}  # [unix]
    about:
      home: https://git.ligo.org/cds/software/dtt
      dev_url: https://git.ligo.org/cds/software/dtt.git
      license: GPL-2.0-or-later
      license_family: GPL
      license_file:
        - COPYING
        - COPYING-GPL-3
      summary: Functions for creating foton-style filter design windows.
      description: |
        Other LIGO programs such as `awggui` and `diaggui` use `libfilterwiz` to create
        `foton`-style filter design windows for one-off filters.

  - name: libsistr
    build:
      error_overlinking: true
      skip: true  # [osx]
    requirements:
      build:
        - {{ compiler('c') }}
        - {{ stdlib("c") }}
        - make  # [unix]
      host:
        - gds-base
        - {{ pin_subpackage('libawg', exact=True) }}
        - {{ pin_subpackage('libtestpoint', exact=True) }}
      run:
        - gds-base
        - {{ pin_subpackage('libawg', exact=True) }}
        - {{ pin_subpackage('libtestpoint', exact=True) }}
    files:
      - include/gds/dtt/SIStr.h
      - lib/libSIStr{{ SHLIB_EXT }}*
    test:
      commands:
        - test -f ${PREFIX}/lib/libSIStr${SHLIB_EXT}  # [unix]
    about:
      home: https://git.ligo.org/cds/software/dtt
      dev_url: https://git.ligo.org/cds/software/dtt.git
      license: GPL-2.0-or-later
      license_family: GPL
      license_file:
        - COPYING
        - COPYING-GPL-3
      summary: Library for sending arbitrary data as excitations using LIGO's awgtpman.
      description: |
        `libsistr` is a library used for streaming custom excitations.

  - name: libtestpoint
    build:
      error_overlinking: false
      skip: true  # [osx]
    requirements:
      build:
        - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
        - {{ stdlib("c") }}
        - make  # [unix]
      host:
        - gds-base
      run:
        - gds-base
    files:
      - include/gds/dtt/testpoint*
      - lib/libtestpoint{{ SHLIB_EXT }}*
    test:
      commands:
        - test -f ${PREFIX}/lib/libtestpoint${SHLIB_EXT}  # [unix]
    about:
      home: https://git.ligo.org/cds/software/dtt
      dev_url: https://git.ligo.org/cds/software/dtt.git
      license: GPL-2.0-or-later
      license_family: GPL
      license_file:
        - COPYING
        - COPYING-GPL-3
      summary: Library for manipulating LIGO test points.
      description: |
        `libtestpoint` allows opening and closing of test points on the LIGO
        real-time data acquisition system.

  - name: crtools-gui-libraries
    build:
      error_overlinking: true
      skip: true  # [osx]
    requirements:
      build:
        - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
        - {{ stdlib("c") }}
        - make  # [unix]
      host:
        - gds-base
        - gds-base-crtools
        - {{ pin_subpackage('libdfm', exact=True) }}
        - {{ pin_subpackage('libfantom', exact=True) }}
        - root_base
      run:
        - gds-base
        - gds-base-crtools
        - {{ pin_subpackage('libdfm', exact=True) }}
        - {{ pin_subpackage('libfantom', exact=True) }}
        - root_base
    files:
      - include/dmtview/
      - include/dtt/dttgui/
      - include/gds/dfm/dfmgui.hh
      - include/gds/dfm/montype.hh
      - include/gds/dfm/TLGDfmChannels.hh
      - include/gds/dfm/TLGDfmMonitors.hh
      - include/gds/dfm/TLGDfmSel.hh
      - include/gds/dfm/TLGDfmServer.hh
      - include/gds/dfm/TLGDfmTimes.hh
      - include/gds/libdax/
      - lib/libdfmgui{{ SHLIB_EXT }}*
      - lib/libdmtview{{ SHLIB_EXT }}*
      - lib/libdttgui{{ SHLIB_EXT }}*
      - lib/liblidax{{ SHLIB_EXT }}*
    test:
      commands:
        - test -f ${PREFIX}/lib/libdfmgui${SHLIB_EXT}  # [unix]
        - test -f ${PREFIX}/lib/libdttgui${SHLIB_EXT}  # [unix]
    about:
      home: https://git.ligo.org/cds/software/dtt
      dev_url: https://git.ligo.org/cds/software/dtt.git
      license: GPL-2.0-or-later
      license_family: GPL
      license_file:
        - COPYING
        - COPYING-GPL-3
      summary: Common libraries used by LIGO control room graphical programs.
      description: |
        The gui libraries provide basic widgets to control room tools apps.

  - name: crtools-root-libraries
    build:
      error_overlinking: true
      skip: true  # [osx]
    requirements:
      build:
        - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
        - {{ stdlib("c") }}
        - make  # [unix]
      host:
        - gds-base
        - {{ pin_subpackage('crtools-gui-libraries', exact=True) }}
        - {{ pin_subpackage('libfilterfile', exact=True) }}
        - root_base
      run:
        - {{ pin_subpackage('crtools-gui-libraries', exact=True) }}
        - {{ pin_subpackage('libfilterfile', exact=True) }}
        - root_base
    files:
      - lib/dmtview*.pcm
      - lib/libRdmtview{{ SHLIB_EXT }}*
      - lib/dttgui*.pcm
      - lib/libRdttgui{{ SHLIB_EXT }}*
      - lib/filterfile*.pcm
      - lib/libRfilterfile{{ SHLIB_EXT }}*
    test:
      commands:
        - test -f ${PREFIX}/lib/libRdttgui${SHLIB_EXT}  # [unix]
        - root -b -l -x -q -e 'gSystem->Load("libRdttgui");'  # [linux]
    about:
      home: https://git.ligo.org/cds/software/dtt
      dev_url: https://git.ligo.org/cds/software/dtt.git
      license: GPL-2.0-or-later
      license_family: GPL
      license_file:
        - COPYING
        - COPYING-GPL-3
      summary: Common ROOT dictionary libraries used by LIGO control room programs.
      description: |
        ROOT dictionaries allow dynamic access to C++ objects.

  # -- python libraries -----

  - name: python-foton
    script: build-python-foton.sh
    build:
      ignore_run_exports:
        - numpy
      skip: true  # [py == 312 and root_base == '6.30.4']
    requirements:
      build:
        - {{ compiler('c') }}
        - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
        - {{ stdlib("c") }}
        - cmake
        - make  # [unix]
        - pkg-config
        # extras for cross-compiling
        - cross-python_{{ target_platform }}  # [build_platform != target_platform]
        - python                              # [build_platform != target_platform]
      host:
        - gds-base
        - {{ pin_subpackage('libfilterfile', exact=True) }}
        - python
        - scipy
      run:
        - gds-base
        - {{ pin_subpackage('libfilterfile', exact=True) }}
        - numpy >=1.20
        - python
        - scipy
    test:
      source_files:
        - src/python/foton/
      commands:
        - (cd src/python/foton/; python foton_test.py)
        - (cd src/python/foton/; python pydmtsigp_test.py)
        - (cd src/python/foton/; python pyfilterfile_test.py)
        - (cd src/python/foton/; python foton_unit_test.py)
    about:
      home: https://git.ligo.org/cds/software/dtt
      dev_url: https://git.ligo.org/cds/software/dtt.git
      license: GPL-2.0-or-later
      license_family: GPL
      license_file:
        - COPYING
        - COPYING-GPL-3
      summary: Python bindings for foton functions
      description: |
        Library for design, inspection and manipulation of filters and
        LIGO style filter files.

  - name: python-awg
    script: build-python-awg.sh
    build:
      error_overlinking: true
      skip: true  # [osx]
      skip: true  # [py == 312 and root_base == '6.30.4']
    requirements:
      build:
        - cmake
        - make  # [unix]
        - pkg-config
        # extras for cross-compiling
        - cross-python_{{ target_platform }}  # [build_platform != target_platform]
        - python                              # [build_platform != target_platform]
      host:
        - nds2-client
        - python
        - root_base
      run:
        - {{ pin_subpackage('libawg', exact=True) }}
        - {{ pin_subpackage('libsistr', exact=True) }}
        - {{ pin_subpackage('libtestpoint', exact=True) }}
        - numpy >=1.20
        - python
        - root_base
        - scipy
    test:
      imports:
        - awg
    about:
      home: https://git.ligo.org/cds/software/dtt
      dev_url: https://git.ligo.org/cds/software/dtt.git
      license: GPL-2.0-or-later
      license_family: GPL
      license_file:
        - COPYING
        - COPYING-GPL-3
      summary: Python bindings to libawg
      description: |
        Create excitations using LIGO\'s awgtpman using Python.
        The awg module allows simple python scripting of excitations
        on the LIGO data acquisition system.

  # -- script packages ------

  - name: chndump
    build:
      error_overlinking: true
      skip: true  # [osx]
    requirements:
      build:
        - {{ compiler('c') }}
        - {{ stdlib("c") }}
        - make  # [unix]
      host:
        - {{ pin_subpackage('libdtt', exact=True) }}
      run:
        - {{ pin_subpackage('libdtt', exact=True) }}
    files:
      - bin/chndump
    test:
      commands:
        # chndump -h returns exit code 1 (command not found is 127)
        - chndump -h || test $? -eq 1  # [unix]

  - name: dmtviewer
    build:
      error_overlinking: true
      skip: true  # [osx]
    requirements:
      build:
        - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
        - {{ stdlib("c") }}
        - make  # [unix]
      host:
        - {{ pin_subpackage('crtools-gui-libraries', exact=True) }}
        - gds-base
        - gds-base-crtools
        - root_base
      run:
        - {{ pin_subpackage('crtools-gui-libraries', exact=True) }}
        - gds-base
        - gds-base-crtools
        - root_base
    files:
      - bin/dmtviewer
    test:
      commands:
        - dmtviewer -h
    about:
      home: https://git.ligo.org/cds/software/dtt
      dev_url: https://git.ligo.org/cds/software/dtt.git
      license: GPL-2.0-or-later
      license_family: GPL
      license_file:
        - COPYING
        - COPYING-GPL-3
      summary: Graphical program for viewing output of DMT monitors.
      description: |
        DMT viewer is used in LIGO control rooms to display DMT data.

  - name: dtt-awggui
    build:
      error_overlinking: true
      skip: true  # [osx]
    requirements:
      build:
        - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
        - {{ stdlib("c") }}
        - make  # [unix]
      host:
        - {{ pin_subpackage('crtools-gui-libraries', exact=True) }}
        - gds-base
        - {{ pin_subpackage('libawg', exact=True) }}
        - {{ pin_subpackage('libtestpoint', exact=True) }}
        - root_base
      run:
        - {{ pin_subpackage('crtools-gui-libraries', exact=True) }}
        - gds-base
        - {{ pin_subpackage('libawg', exact=True) }}
        - {{ pin_subpackage('libtestpoint', exact=True) }}
        - root_base
    files:
      - bin/awggui
    test:
      commands:
        - awggui -h
    about:
      home: https://git.ligo.org/cds/software/dtt
      dev_url: https://git.ligo.org/cds/software/dtt.git
      license: GPL-2.0-or-later
      license_family: GPL
      license_file:
        - COPYING
        - COPYING-GPL-3
      summary: Graphical program for running excitations using LIGO's awgtpman.
      description: |
        `awggui` is an interface for creating excitations on LIGO's data
        acquisition system, including many periodic functions, random noise
        excitations, and custom user-defined excitations.

  - name: dtt-awgstream
    build:
      error_overlinking: true
      skip: true  # [osx]
    requirements:
      build:
        - {{ compiler('c') }}
        - {{ stdlib("c") }}
        - make  # [unix]
      host:
        #- {{ pin_subpackage('crtools-gui-libraries', exact=True) }}
        - gds-base
        - {{ pin_subpackage('libawg', exact=True) }}
        - {{ pin_subpackage('libsistr', exact=True) }}
        - {{ pin_subpackage('libtestpoint', exact=True) }}
        #- root_base
      run:
        #- {{ pin_subpackage('crtools-gui-libraries', exact=True) }}
        - gds-base
        - {{ pin_subpackage('libawg', exact=True) }}
        - {{ pin_subpackage('libsistr', exact=True) }}
        - {{ pin_subpackage('libtestpoint', exact=True) }}
        #- root_base
    files:
      - bin/awgstream
      - bin/awgexc_run
    test:
      commands:
        - awgstream
        - awgexc_run || test $? -eq 1  # [unix]
    about:
      home: https://git.ligo.org/cds/software/dtt
      dev_url: https://git.ligo.org/cds/software/dtt.git
      license: GPL-2.0-or-later
      license_family: GPL
      license_file:
        - COPYING
        - COPYING-GPL-3
      summary: Stream arbitrary data as an excitation using LIGO's awgtpman.
      description: |
        Includes awgexec_run program for streaming excitations from Matlab.

  - name: dtt-diag
    build:
      error_overlinking: true
      skip: true  # [osx]
    requirements:
      build:
        - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
        - {{ stdlib("c") }}
        - make  # [unix]
      host:
        - {{ pin_subpackage('libdtt', exact=True) }}
      run:
        - {{ pin_subpackage('libdtt', exact=True) }}
    files:
      - bin/diag
    test:
      commands:
        - diag -help
    about:

      license_family: GPL

        - COPYING-GPL-3
      summary: Command line program for running LIGO's Diagnostics Test Tools
      description: |

        real-time data acquisition system.

      license_family: GPL
      license_file:
        - COPYING
        - COPYING-GPL-3
      summary: Daemon for running LIGO's Diagnostics Test Tools remotely
      description: |

    about:

  - name: dtt-monitors
    build:

      commands:
        - echo -e "10 1e-21\n50 1e-22\n100 1e-23\n200 1e-22" | InspiralRange 4000
    about:
      home: https://git.ligo.org/cds/software/dtt
      dev_url: https://git.ligo.org/cds/software/dtt.git
      license: GPL-2.0-or-later
      license_family: GPL
      license_file:
        - COPYING
        - COPYING-GPL-3

    build:

        - make  # [unix]

    about:

      license_family: GPL
      license_file:
        - COPYING
        - COPYING-GPL-3
      summary: Stream multiple arbitrary data sets as excitations using LIGO's awgtpman.
      description: |

        LIGO's real-time data acquisition system.

  - name: dtt-tpcmd
    build:

    about:
      home: https://git.ligo.org/cds/software/dtt

      license_family: GPL
      license_file:
        - COPYING
        - COPYING-GPL-3
      summary: Command line tool for manipulating test points using LIGO's awgtpman.
      description: |

        conda update --prefix /build/jenkins/home/mambaforge/envs/buildenvs anaconda

  - name: dtt-xml-tools
    build:

    test:

  - name: lidax

  # -- metapackage ----------

  - name: cds-crtools
    build:
      error_overlinking: true
      skip: true  # [osx]
      skip: true  # [py == 312 and root_base == '6.30.4']
    requirements:
      host:
        - python
        - root_base
      run:
        - python
        # all of the outputs
        - {{ pin_subpackage('chndump', exact=True) }}
        - {{ pin_subpackage('dmtviewer', exact=True) }}
        - {{ pin_subpackage('dtt-diag', exact=True) }}
        - {{ pin_subpackage('dtt-diagd', exact=True) }}
        - {{ pin_subpackage('dtt-diaggui', exact=True) }}
        - {{ pin_subpackage('dtt-awggui', exact=True) }}
        - {{ pin_subpackage('dtt-awgstream', exact=True) }}
        - {{ pin_subpackage('dtt-multiawgstream', exact=True) }}
        - {{ pin_subpackage('dtt-tpcmd', exact=True) }}
        - {{ pin_subpackage('dtt-xml-tools', exact=True) }}
        - {{ pin_subpackage('foton', exact=True) }}
        - {{ pin_subpackage('lidax', exact=True) }}
        - {{ pin_subpackage('python-awg', exact=True) }}
        - {{ pin_subpackage('python-foton', exact=True) }}
    test:
      commands:
        - diaggui -h
        - foton -h
    about:
      home: https://git.ligo.org/cds/software/dtt
      dev_url: https://git.ligo.org/cds/software/dtt.git
      license: GPL-2.0-or-later
      license_family: GPL
      license_file:
        - COPYING
        - COPYING-GPL-3
      summary: CDS Control Room tools
      description: |
        cds-crtools is a metapackage that installs several programs
        used to control LIGO-style interfrometers. The package includes
        `diag`, `diagd`, `diaggui`, `awggui`, `tpcmd`, `chndump`
        along with `foton`, the filter design program, and others.

  summary: CDS Control Room tools
